title: #177 - Ron Radziner, FAIA Architect on Design, Single-Family Homes, and More
itunes:title: #177 - Ron Radziner, FAIA Architect on Design, Single-Family Homes, and More
description:
As Design Partner of Marmol Radziner since the firm was founded in 1989, Ron has led the design of every project. In 2007, he was elevated to the prestigious College of the Fellows of the American Institute of Architects. Ron was honored as an inductee of the Interior Design Hall of Fame in 2009.

The Midnight Charette is now The Second Studio.

content:encoded:
As Design Partner of Marmol Radziner since the firm was founded in 1989, Ron has led the design of every project. In 2007, he was elevated to the prestigious College of the Fellows of the American Institute of Architects. Ron was honored as an inductee of the Interior Design Hall of Fame in 2009.

The Midnight Charette is now The Second Studio.

itunes:subtitle: Design-build, design philosophies, design process, office evolution and more
